docs.snippet: LAKE JUNALUSKA, N.C., Sept. 3-- A Methodist bishop from Argentina changed here today that the Roman Catholic  hierarchy in Latin America was "extremely totalitarian, exclusivist and ruthless."
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE JUNALUSKA, N.C., Sept. 3-- A Methodist bishop from Argentina changed here today that the Roman Catholic hierarchy in Latin America was "extremely totalitarian, exclusivist and ruthless."
docs.abstract: Meth Bishop Barbieri criticizes RC Ch for stressing Virgin Mary in Latin Amer so much that area has been designated by many Cath authorities as 'land of Mary,' s, World Meth Conf; says every appearance of Mary has become 'excuse for bldg a sanctuary,'

headline.main: METHODIST CHIDES LATIN HIERARCHY; Argentine Protestant Bishop Calls the Catholic Clergy Ruthless, the People Kind Works in 10 Countries

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, Sept. 6--With President Adolfo Ruiz Cortines giving the starting signal, buildings throughout Mexico will be sprayed and dusted with insectides by health squads starting tomorrow.
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, Sept. 6--With President Adolfo Ruiz Cortines giving the starting signal, buildings throughout Mexico will be sprayed and dusted with insectides by health squads starting tomorrow.
docs.abstract: Mex starts 5-yr eradication drive under pact with UNICEF, WHO and ICA; to put up $12 million; UNICEF to give $8.4 million in equipment; other groups supply technicians; 700,000 bldgs to be sprayed every 6 mos for 3 yrs

headline.main: Mexico Starts Drive on Malaria Today; House-to-House Spraying Is First Stage

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Sept. 6-- United States-Brazilian negotiations for supplying Brazil with 1,800,000 tons of wheat from surplus stocks appear to have hit a snag.
